name: TP Link AC1200 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router (Archer C54)
description: Experience fast and reliable internet connectivity with the TP Link AC1200 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router. Perfect for streaming, gaming, and browsing.

name: Lenovo Thinkpad Pro 2.0
short_description: Professional-grade laptop for all your needs.
description: The Lenovo Thinkpad Pro 2.0 offers superior performance and durability. Ideal for professionals seeking reliability and power.

name: Adata UV128/128GB Flashdrive
description: Store and transfer your data with ease using the Adata UV128 128GB Flashdrive. Compact and convenient for everyday use.

name: Hikvision 21 inch Color Monitor with HDMI Port
description: Enhance your viewing experience with the Hikvision 21 inch Color Monitor. Features HDMI port for easy connectivity.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 offers cutting-edge technology and sleek design. Enjoy stunning photos, fast performance, and seamless connectivity.

name: Apple MacBook Air M1
description: The Apple MacBook Air with M1 chip delivers exceptional performance in a thin and light design. Perfect for work, study, and entertainment.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones
description: Experience immersive sound with the Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones. Features industry-leading noise cancellation and long battery life.

name: Fitbit Charge 4
description: The Fitbit Charge 4 helps you stay on top of your fitness goals with built-in GPS, heart rate tracking, and sleep monitoring.

name: Canon EOS 1500D DSLR Camera
description: The Canon EOS 1500D is a versatile DSLR camera ideal for both beginners and enthusiasts. Features a 24.1 MP sensor and full HD video recording.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (4th Gen)
description: The Amazon Echo Dot (4th Gen) is a compact smart speaker that fits perfectly into small spaces. Voice control your music, smart home devices, and more.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Bluetooth Speaker
description: Enjoy deep, loud, and immersive sound with the Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Bluetooth Speaker. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 7 offers the versatility of a laptop and tablet in one sleek device. Ideal for work, play, and everything in between.

name: Dyson V11 Absolute Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
description: The Dyson V11 Absolute provides powerful suction and advanced filtration for a thorough clean. Perfect for all floor types.

name: GoPro HERO9 Black
description: Capture stunning 5K video and 20MP photos with the GoPro HERO9 Black. Features HyperSmooth 3.0 stabilization and a front-facing display.

name: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 Graphics Card
description: The Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 delivers unmatched performance for gaming and creative tasks. Experience ray tracing and AI-enhanced graphics.

name: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance Starter Kit
description: Transform your home lighting with the Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance Starter Kit. Control with your voice or smartphone for the perfect ambiance.

name: DJI Mavic Air 2 Drone
short_description: Advanced drone for photography and videography.
description: The DJI Mavic Air 2 offers stunning 4K video and 48MP photos. Features intelligent shooting modes and a long flight time for capturing every moment.

name: Anker PowerCore 10000 Portable Charger
description: The Anker PowerCore 10000 offers high-speed charging for your devices on the go. Compact and lightweight, perfect for travel.

name: Garmin Forerunner 945 GPS Smartwatch
description: The Garmin Forerunner 945 offers comprehensive training and performance metrics, along with built-in music storage and maps. Perfect for serious athletes.

name: Razer DeathAdder V2 Gaming Mouse
description: The Razer DeathAdder V2 provides an ergonomic design and high-precision tracking for competitive gaming. Features customizable buttons and RGB lighting.
